title: Blade Runner
review: It 's so funny and fightened.I like this interesting movie.Can't wait to see it next time.

title: One can not always be perfect.
review: I watched this film first time with my mom.Some sences in this movie is just a little unfit for a eleven-year-old girl.But When I watch it again,I have got something different from this excellent movie.I hope everyone could be the best,but always remember yourself.

title: Swan Song!
review: The film features female as the main character, but in the end it leaves only an unforgettable and obsessed male protagonist.Prince Albert is handsome, he has soft hair and affectionate eyes.Queen Victoria is also beautiful.

title: Kung Fu Panda
review: This is a story about a panda who can play Kung Fu very well.Although he looks very cute in appearance,he is very strict when he met dangerous or difficulties.I like his courage.He gaves me a lot strength.

title: Loyal,Brave and True.
review: In 1998,Disney made this Chinese folk story into a film.And turned this into a live-action movie in 2020.I like the line which said by the new mulan,Loyal brave and true.This is what Mulan in my sight.She was strong but gentle.The war made her a real soldier,but she made herself a true leader.She broke the distinction between men and women.She is a warrior.And I also can't wait to see the live-action film in the cinema.I love Mulan,she is the role modle in my whole life.

title: Something Different in a Simple City.
review: I saw it first time with whole my classmates.In a kid's sight,this film is so interesting.Judy and Nike are so clever,brave and funny.But,when a adult watched it.The much was about the fear when Judy talk to the strangers.There are so differences in Disney film.

title: Warm,Love and adventurous
review: I have to say that I just learned that who played Dory was Ellen which is the hostess of Ellen Show,it was so cool to hear that.And back to this movie,the story touched me a lot,I really like it.Nemo was so cute and had every details of a kid in his way.Marlin loves Nemo very much.Just as every parents do.

title: A charming man
review: I love this story,but I just learnt the things what the actress has done,I was so disappointed.Althought she has done something wrong,but I just wanna to say that the movie is pretty good and I love the song especially Everything I Need.Also,the fight sences are very charming,just like the real people fighting in front of you.The actors and director are the best.

title: a Warm,Cheerful and Beautiful Story.
review: I watched My Neighbor Totoro two years before which was my third time to see the film.When it was my first time to watch this film,children always could just see the lovely things like Totoro.He is such a kind,warm and cute character that nobody doesn't love him.He has also brought the great and fantastic memories to lots of people.The movie showed us the unkwonen world.It is so cool to see the volant bus and so many uncredictable things.

title: A very sincere movie
review: Seeing the end is very warm, and the song is very nice.

title: You Have to Give People Hope
review: When watching movies, I want to cry but I can't cry.Not because the film was not sensational enough, but because it was too repressive and things happened one after another, but we were powerless.I hope everyone can love what they love.

title: Suicide Squad
review: I saw the first movie which casted by Will Smith was Aladdin.He is talended in casting also singing.He is great.

title: The Magical Long Fair.
review: What an awesome movie.Repunzel,who was a great beautiful and kind girl.She was special.She has long gold curly hair which was full of magic.She also has a lot of people who loved her so much.This is such a real Princess movie.I love it.Hope could see the live-action movie of this in the future.

title: Warm and Funny
review: Never judge one's heart by one's appearanceI .I like simple and beautiful things, and sometimes I don't want to think about too many complicated things.

title: Humorous, profound, authentic
review: Coen Brothers works, accident is the main theme of life.Crime story mixed life joke.Everyone's seriousness is a bit stupid.

movie_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
title: The Lord of the Rings
review: Frodo: I wish the ring had never come to me. I wish none of this had happended.I love this line.

title: The beautiful scenery under the beautiful scenery
review: There are very much worthy of praise, and every story, there will be a wonderful long lens. The cruel bear and the mission of the people are very exciting, and the last paragraph, sublimation.

review:
A good movie.Tom Hanks is always an actor who I love so much.
Sharing my favorite line:
I am Irish,you are German.But what makes us both Americans?Just one thing.One,one,one.The rule book.We call it constitution.

title: The shortest love has the longest waiting time.
review: Look,Look at the sky now,what color is it?Or the way,a hawk flies?Or you wake up,and your ribes are bruised thinking so hard on somebody,what do you call that?

title: I Love the Spider Man.
review: Since I first time to watch Stan Lee's production,I have been fell in love with this Spider.He was so brave and true to everyone.

title: Dallas Buyers Club
review: The director shot the heaviest subject in the most relaxed state.The protagonists all showed first-class performances.An ordinary person makes an extraordinary choice in an extraordinary state.People finally transcended disease.

movie_title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
title: An Amazing Film
review: I like Harry Potter's prequel more than the Harry Potter series,Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them. I remember there was a platypus that liked metal objects, it was so cute.It is a very interesting thing for the magicians to live in the Muggle world. I can't wait to see the third one.

title: Touching Magical and Uncredictable
review:
I have already seen this movie for three times and I love it very much.When I was a child, I watched it in the theater. In the last sence, I was so touched by the sence and cried.It is a movie which could bring me back to the old time.I love it very much.
There are two lines which move my heart:
Lin: What's going on there?
Kamaji:Something you would not recognize. It
called love.

title: A rivilization has gone with the wind.
review: A civilization drifts with the wind, and it will drift after all; a dream of a person drifts with the wind, and will drift.Along with civilization are countless life forms, a generation, but also a generation's dream, a generation's lifestyle.After civilization has passed, do you choose to live in memory, or abandon the past and start over. Several options are given in the movie.

title: I love Pixar.
review: Intertwined with joy and touch, sadness and joy. Disney movies are always suitable for adults and children to watch together, different perspectives will find different highlights.

title: Scared and Horrible.
review: The atmosphere is very good, I like the director's shooting method, a thought-provoking story, I was scared many times.

title: Dream in dream
review: The fun of Mermaid attracted me.She is so real, but the reality is also very cruel.

title: One is not born,but rather becomes,a woman.
review: What touched me most about the film was that Jasmine not only made itself, but also made this country.I like the spirit conveyed by this movie and hope that it can affect more women in the world and learn to improve themselves.

title: The first movie of Disney that I have seen in theater.
review: Personally, I think it is a wonderful and perfect movie.The songs,the characters,the sences are very exciting me.Elsa is cowardly at first, but when she went through many difficulties,she has become a truly queen of her country Arendelle.Anne is so brave and beautiful,as they sisters are pretty beautiful.The story between two girls has made a wonderful images in children's hearts.The difficulties and troubles just let it go.

title: Fantasy and Charming
review: This is very unexpected that to see so many Incredible things and abilities in Pixar's film.It just like a new world in a simple world which is full of challenges and possibilities.When I was young,I used to watch Disney's film.That was all my childhood

title: I Am Legend.
review: When the zombies are besieged, how lonely there is only one person left.Only canned food can be eaten, and life is better than death, the protagonist is too difficult.

title: Is it better to speak or die?
review: Personally,sometime the true love was not just a happy ending.This two man are so handsome.I love this movie.

title: Full Marks
review: After all, I haven't watched a movie for a long time and cried like a child.It seems that everyone has to talk about the old saying again:Movies are excellent dream-building issues.Those families who can't go back to their hometowns can only meet in dreams again.

title: A war that broke out in April 6th,1917
review: I hope today is a good day.Hope is a dangerous thing.That is my favorite line.

title: My Darling,My Blood
review: The oxygen tube finally pulled out is the most human relief.

title: A Heartwarming Work
review: The protagonist is very cute and takes care of people. I like this character very much.

title: A Brave Girl
review: The Princess Merida has made me surprised.She is so brave but a little stupid.The adventure story of her made her a strong and warm heart.I think one of the most popular sences was when her mother became a huge also lovely bear.That was so funny.I would like to share my favorite line to you guys here: Princess Merida: There are those who say fate is something beyond our command. That destiny is not our own, but I know better. Our fate lives within us, you only have to be brave enough to see it.Hope everyone could be the bravest man in their heart.

title: The Last Emperor
review: God made. I don't think it 's long for three hours. The director didn't waste any shots.Soundtrack is great.An excellent Chinese movie, by the Italian director.

title: Love this strong, smart and inspiring young girl with her own ideas.
review: Everyone wants to be themselves, but they are always bound by those rules unconsciously,Alice achieves spiritual independence that most people do not.I hope everyone can live as they are.

title: A special imaginative film
review: I really like these blue tall creatures, Avatars. They are all friendly, kind and sincere.Some scenes in the movie are really beautiful.The director's imagination is amazing.

title: Great to be annoying
review: Some people are born with a speech personality. Pursue freedom, never stop.

title: Top Ten of the Year:La La Land.
review: Finally found a resonating point in the love words,Life is a journey of chasing dreams. At one point in time, one person meets another.They grow together, encourage each other, there is goodness and pain, growth, regret.This is life.PS:I also love the song and dance.

title: Life is Beautifel
review: Love is the greatest, it can accommodate everything. I hope that those who have experienced hardships can now have a beautiful life now.

title: Get back the long-lost dreams, before I got older.
review: What moved me the most was the beginning of the movie, where a couple got along and shared their interests.It is full of love and dreams, courage and hope.Finally, the most boring things are what I miss the most.Touch the softest tenderness in my heart.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
review: I have seen the last one in film this year.It was pretty good to watch a dragon's growing and became a leader in the end.I love this movie.Fun and warmth are all in it.

title: A beautiful love story
review: I love the sence in this movie.Especially when Elle danced with the beast it was so moving.The beast and the beauty love each other.Their story was so beautiful that touched me very much.The things in the old castle were all inteligent and great.I love them all.

title: Nearer My God To Three.
review: If I can take a time machine back to 1912, I must be excited as a journalist.The pride of the iron and steel industry era, the maiden voyage of the so-called unsinkable giant ship, is worth being recorded in history.In 2017, when I read the history of journalism, what was recorded on the paper was not a miracle but a disaster.However, there is a beautiful and sad story in the disaster.In fact, falling in love with a person takes only a moment.

movie_title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
title: Sorcerer's Stone
review: This is my favorite part of the Harry Potter series, it was full of imagination.Although he was empowered by his parents, Harry worked very hard and bravely faced the storm.There was where I admired him.

title: Love and Touching.
review: Water Matter is a beautiful love story, ostensibly a love story about mermaid and mermaid, which in fact reflects the fact that the two countries adopted various ways to increase their national strength in the wake of the Cold War of the 1960s, and that the heroine was a mute at the end of the movie.

title: A model for disaster films
review: Step by step for the camp atmosphere.It's like spreading breadcrumbs to lead people to the Jaws.Can't help but love the soundtrack of John Williams.

title: Find your own sparkle in the dark
review: The film is full of slow positive energy, showing the life of a person, conveying an attitude and strength worth learning.Close your eyes and you will see the whole world.

title: A classic educational also growing movie, which is suitable for anybody.
review: The Lion King is one of the most popular creations of the Walt Disney Studios.From year and year, people could really receive the energy from this movie.The story between Mufasa and his son Simba has touched a lot of people around the world.It's a movie which is educational not only for parents,but also for kids.They can learn the firm spirit from this great movie.I will watch it again and again.

title: So Amazing and Incredible
review: I love this movie which is full of imagination and energy.Leonardo is so cool in this movie.I would like to watch it again next Sunday.The sences are so cool.

title: A Cute and Warm Story
review: Walle is a robot ,but he knows everything.This story is so warm that I was touched by the characters.

title: This is the only movie that made me cry recently
review: Without a crown, how do you know how heavy it is.The film has written the world's hearts and minds with the plight of the queen within a week, and the times have changed.It was so good.

title: Black Panther.
review: A person's growth process, a science fiction masterpiece, has many places for thought.

title: Toy Story 3
review: I love the Toy Story series,and each one I have seen it in the theatre.Also,Pixar's film never let me down.The advanturous part attracked me the most.

movie_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
title: The Return of the King
review:
Sharing my favorite dialogue:
Gimli: Never thought I'd die fighting side by side with an Elf.
Legolas: What about side by side with a friend?
Gimli: Aye. I could do that.

title: Metaphor of Manipulation in Media Age.
review: An almost cruel story gives us an interesting answer by way of narration.Truman only belongs to The Truman Show, a manipulated virtual world.However, Truman does not belong to The Truman Show alone. He is at the same time you and I who live in this world filled with electronic smoke.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
title: A Famous and Topic Film
review: This kind of film carried too many people's memories, it was people's infinite reverie of the future.It was a very successful epic.

title: Green Book
review: It is a fun story in my sight.A gay black man and a straight caucasian man,we cannot imagine what would happen around them.How much Don doesn't look down on Tony casually, how much Tony looks down on Don's tweaking.The Green Book is playfully causing friction between driver and employer.In the end, not only did the relationship between the protagonists change, Tony's relatives who once looked down on black people also welcomed Don at the Christmas party.

title: Aladdin and Princess Jasmine
review: Although the live-action version made a big change on the basis of the original animation when shooting.I still like the original version, and each version has advantages.I hope Disney can make more excellent animated movies and live-action movies.

title: Happy memories
review: I love this cute movie,just like a couple of good friends around me.They gave me a lot happiness.

title: Back to the Future
review: Stunning in 1985, you can shoot this interesting movie. Classic, but there is a vulnerability. Although the plot now looks a bit old set, it is indeed a great thing in that era. There is a fun advertising, lavender CK underwear.

title: Why Gatsby was great?
review: I believe many people have this question at first.In the movie, Gatsby loves Daisy very much. Although he understands that this woman has betrayed him and became the wife of another, he is still willing to give up money and power for her.Gatsby gives up God-like freedom for Daisy.What a pure love.Too much material pursuit will make us lose ourselves,which was all the movie gave to me.

title: The Godfather
review: I reviewed it two days ago and I just wanna to say it's a famous but sad story.I will watch it again
